hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE/DOGE) 15-Minute Volume-Weighted Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, PEPE or DOGE experiencing a 15-minute price move of ±7%+ on volume 3x+ average will revert 50% of the move within 90 minutes with >63% probability, providing counter-trend entries.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins in neutral markets lack sustained momentum. Extreme short-term moves are often driven by retail herd behavior and low-liquidity pools. Market makers and arbitrage bots quickly fade these moves. The 50% retracement target is common Fibonacci level.
entry_conditions: PEPE or DOGE (whichever has higher volume)
No major exchange listing or influencer tweet in past 2 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial ±7% move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price continues another 3% in same direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If success rate < 55% or average holding time >60 minutes for winners (too slow for scalping edge)
